entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. A few showers beginning late in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
